p: Final population size (number of potential breeding pairs) was compared among the scenario classes ( n = three per class, 20 replicate simulations per scenario) or climate scenario ( n = 20 per climate scenario) using analysis of variance (ANOVA), followed by a post hoc test for least significant differences using a Tukey's HSD test. Data were assessed for normality prior to analysis using normal Q–Q plots. All analyses were conducted in R version 2.13.0 (R Core Team 2011).
